Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-0540 Atlassian ira Server, Data Center, Jira Service Management Server, and Data Center Seraph Vulnerability
text: Atlassian ira Server and Data Center and Jira Service Management Server and Data Center could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a flaw in Jira Seraph. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication
